name: Kill the Pineapple (itch)
description:
"Kill the Pineapple" is a surreal and psychedelic third-person shooter with a story- and a survival-mode.It was developed by Nut-Wombat Studios in 2012.There are 4 Bosslevels,4 different weapons(+1 secret weapon),trophies and a score-system.

  • TITLE:"Kill the Pineapple"
  • GENRE:"Third Person Shooter"
  • THEME:"Psychedelic"
  • PLATFORM:"PC"
  • LANGUAGE:"ENGLISH"
  • PLAYING TIME:"endless"
  • DEVELOPER:"Nut-Wombat Studios"
  • YEAR:"2012"
  • EXTRAS:"Soundtrack"
